mapper.select: SELECT b.mtno, b.mttitle, if(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d')= DATE_FORMAT(mtdate,'%Y-%m-%d'), DATE_FORMAT(mtdate,'%H:%i'), DATE_FORMAT(mtdate,'%Y-%m-%d')) AS mtdate , b.mtcate, b.mtread, m.mname FROM multiboard b JOIN member m ON m.mno = b.mno WHERE mtcate = ${cate} AND mtdel = 1 ORDER BY mtno DESC LIMIT 0,10
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO multiboard (mttitle, mtcontent, mno, mtip, mtcate) VALUES (#{title},#{content},(SELECT mno FROM member WHERE mid = #{mid}),#{mtip},#{mtcate})
mapper.update: UPDATE multiboard SET mtdel = 0 WHERE mtno = #{no}
